official-title.#text: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to provide for greater transparency and efficiency in the procedures followed by the Federal Communications Commission, and for other purposes.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives March 11, 2014.

establish procedures for the inclusion of the specific language of the proposed rule or the proposed amendment of an existing rule in a notice of proposed rulemaking; and
require notices of proposed rulemaking and orders adopting a rule or amending an existing rule that—
create (or propose to create) a program activity to contain performance measures for evaluating the effectiveness of the program activity; and
substantially change (or propose to substantially change) a program activity to contain—
performance measures for evaluating the effectiveness of the program activity as changed (or proposed to be changed); or
a finding that existing performance measures will effectively evaluate the program activity as changed (or proposed to be changed).
